subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Adam Henrique, a 21-year-old center playing on a line with Zach Parise and Ilya Kovalchuk, is off to a strong start with 10 goals and 18 assists.
snippet: Adam Henrique, a 21-year-old center playing on a line with Zach Parise and Ilya Kovalchuk, is off to a strong start with 10 goals and 18 assists.
